Reviews.title: Love it but could be better
Reviews.text: I’ve been on Tik Tok since summer of 2019. As a tik tok addict but more of a consumer than creator here are my comments. I don’t like the new update where it gives you a tutorial on how to use the app. I much preferred when an ad would come up when you first opened the app. We all know how to sue the app and if you don’t, ask a friend. Second, I think you should be able to rewind/fast forward in videos. I know at one point you could do that with certain video and I’m not sure if that is still a feature but I think you should be able to do that with all videos. Third, I think it should be easier for small creators to get on the for you page. All I ever see on my for you page is big creators. Fourth, I really don’t like when the notification comes up “you are going too fast. Take a break” because sometimes I’m just spamming a certain account and that’s annoying but also when that comes up sometimes I will set my phone down for a couple hours and when I come back, it still says that and I can’t like anything even though I’ve been off the app for several hours. All that being said, I love the app. It’s a great way for me to unwind after a long day and also a good break.

Reviews.title: It’s amazing but....
Reviews.text: I love this app and probably spend to much time on it. I love the people on it but sometimes stuff is taken down for no reason or people report random stuff because they hate that person or take what they are saying the wrong way. Another thing I don’t like is that you have to have a certain amount of followers to go live, I think we should be able to go live no matter how many followers we have. A ton of people on the app aren’t that popular to go live. I also think we should have the dislike button back, people are just using it for fun and if people are hurt that their comments are being disliked because they wrote hate, they shouldn’t have commented it in the first place. I also think if the sound is deleted or whatever happens, it shouldn’t delete the sound of people’s videos who have their video already made. I also think they should work on the sound when making a video with Bluetooth headphones because it destroys my eardrums when I go to make videos with them. I also think you should be more careful with who is getting on the app when they are below age and their parents don’t know about it. I mean, if their parents are okay with it, they should be allowed to be on it. I also think you should be able to sort your favorite sounds because I often loose them when I add more.

Reviews.title: its a cool app, but a little sketchy.
Reviews.text: i love the app, it has many talented creators, and always seems to make me laugh every day. but there are some inconveniences that i dont understand. the community guidelines are very confusing. like the app takes down a tik tok for no reason. for example: one of the creators on tik tok’s video got taken down for “violating community guidlines” when all she was doing was lip syncing. and she wasnt wearing any revealing clothes. in fact she was wearing a t shirt and pants. but yet some tik toks of girls twerking and some tik toks of boys sayinf very sexual things don’t get taken down? its almost like tik tok is picking favorites (and it also seems like they’re choosing to keep the ‘pretty/model-like’ peoples tik toks up even though its all very inappropriate.)i mean no hate against those creators, but it seems a little sketchy to me and others on the app. and also there is a lot and i mean A LOT of hate going towards creators that didn’t do anything wrong! there are death threats, messages telling people to kill themselves, and such terrible things being said to creators and i personally think those types of comments should be taken down. and some creators get taken down for no reason either. for example: i saw one of my favorite creators who in fact hasn’t done anything inappropriate or rude to others got banned but people like perez hilton get to stay on the app? it’s very sketchy and scary.

Reviews.title: Nice But Toxic
Reviews.text: i’ve had this app since December 2018, when it first started getting popular. back in 2018 it was fun, no clout chasing, no hype, or any drama. but then in 2019 we started getting all of these big creators who started lots of drama (including charli damelio.) it’s not their fault they got the hype, but the app used to be really fun but now all it is is just dancing and toxic people.. the trends in 2018 were funny, and didn’t involve any toxicity towards anyone. the only time the app was kinda of toxic was when people dueted cringe tiktokers but they were mostly funny. i know tiktok can’t change the algorithm since everyone has different for you pages, but that’s another thing. people are claiming they’re on “alt tiktok” or “deep tiktok” because they have cursed videos on their for you pages. and then “straight tiktok” is all of the famous tiktokers who dance, like the hype house and unfunny type of stuff. and i know tiktok can’t change that either, but it would be cool if musically was back because back then there was 0 toxic people and it was super fun And chill. and lately lots of people are getting canceled on tiktok too... anyways i think the app is fun and it’s cool to see all the videos people make. it’s kind of like vine, except not the same energy. if you are going to get this app just remember there are LOTS of toxic people and rude people.

Reviews.title: more to tik tok
Reviews.text: i LOVE tik tok so much. i think i speak for most of the population when i say that basically all i do during quarantine is make and watch tik tok. however, there are a few suggestions that i have. my first would be that there should be a dislike button on videos. a lot of the time if there is a controversial video people have to like it to save it which gives that creator more clout. if you put a dislike button, it shows the creator how many people he/she truly upset. i understand why that could be a bad thing but maybe try it and take it away if it gets too bad? this next suggestion is one that i have thought of since i got the app. when i really like a video, want to recreate it, show it to my friends, watch later, etc. i put the video into my favorites. however, i now have so many videos in my favorites that i can’t even find the video i need at the time. for this issue, i wish so deeply that the favorites section had different folders that you could name. this way, when you go to put the video in your favorites it asks which folder, you could name a folder, watch later, dances, show to people, etc. tik tok is a great app but please please please take my last idea into consideration.

Reviews.title: Read below
Reviews.text: They got rid of messaging for anyone ages 15 and below. I personally think this is, while at first seeming ok, absolute crap. Not only do most of creators get views this way, a lot of the app is 15 and under. This can be a big issue for small creators or anyone with a fanbase targeted at younger teens. More importantly the app is already 13+ and I don't really see the importance of making messaging 16+ if people are just going to resort to messaging on other platforms about the same thing. If anything it's pushing people away from the app. This can also be an issue if you put in the wrong birthdate or just put in whatever one not really caring about it because they don't respond to the support tickets that people send out to address this issue and certainly don't fix it. Secondly they take down videos that creators post that have no real issue with them and won't say why they took it down, the only hint you get is they send you to the terms and conditions page about what you can post and most of the time the videos being taken down don't break any of the terms and conditions. A lot of the videos they do take down are fine or if they do have an issue, they leave videos that are practically exactly the same but on a larger creators page up. Overall the app has good creators and good people on it and the only real issue is the people in charge of running it.

Reviews.title: Love the app, but....
Reviews.text: Hi, first I just wanted to say that I absolutely LOVE TikTok and use the app on a daily basis, but I have noticed a few things that bother me. The first thing is when you are uploading a video, you can’t save videos,sounds,etc. This bugs me because there a several times I’m on the For You Page and I want to save a video or sound, but I can’t because I’m uploading a video, and then I will accidentally lose the video or sound and not be able to get it back. The next thing is I only ever see people with 1.5k or more likes on my For You Page, and I would appreciate it very much if it were easier for smaller accounts to get views, because most of the time the smaller accounts work just as hard as the larger ones. The last thing is about the comments. I wish people couldn’t limit the comment section to only ONE person. I understand if it is limited where only friends can comment or if nobody could comment, but I feel like limiting the comment section to only one person could make people feel not welcome and it is a big waste of a comment section. Thank you for making it this far in my review. Once again, I LOVE TikTok but these are just some small things I don’t love.

Reviews.text: The people on here are so toxic! Every time I comment my opinion I get attacked and it RUINS my day! Not even gonna MENTION the creeps on here! I’m not an angry mom or karen, but I think if something is innapropriate on there, it should be taken down IMMEDIATLY. I’ve made A LOT of reports, and only ONE of them got accepted. I’ve reported someone who told another to KILL THEIRSELVES and the victim that got told to almost DID! If something looks fishy, then I suggest to take down that account and ban them temporarily. Also, PEREZ HILTON SHOULD BE BANNED!! IDK WHY HES NOT! He litterally wants teens off this app, but the app was MADE FOR TEENS, adults and five year olds just snuck on there. I get like 10+, because that’s the time they start learning, and have health class, but 9- SHOULD NOT, I repeat, SHOULD NOT BE ON TIKTOK WITHOUT A PRIVATE ACCOUNT. My sister is seven years old, and she’s on private, no trouble, but there’s some FIVE YEAR OLDS on here, that don’t have restriction to any nudity or innapropriate stuff, then they think it’s okay to make. On the bright side, if there’s a vid that says, “Opinions are available here, no fighting,” I love it. Healthy and strong opinions with no arguments within it. This app is very fun and addicting, but there’s some things to change!

Reviews.title: SEMI-LARGE CREATOR SUGGESTION
Reviews.text: i have 40k in tiktok, which i know isn’t insane but i’m friends with a lot of big creators that feel the same way. the way lives and the following feed works is dumb. i have a friend with almost 300k followers and he usually has 50-60 followers in his live at a time. i have 40k and i only get 10-15 in a live. are people not getting live notifications or are they not showing up for people? if the only way for a person to join your live is to go to their notification screen (which most people probably hardly ever check because most people don’t make videos) then no one is viewing the lives. and the following page irritates me too, just make the most recent post the top of your feed and scroll!! i’m following 150-ish people and i see the same 4-5 people on my following page and no one else. at least give people the option to either have a following page where it’s their “most viewed” or whatever person at the top or in plain old chronological order, how i think it should be. other than that i truly do love this app i just think it needs a lot of small adjustments (i also think the new update where you see the amount of views a video got is dumb, just let them see the likes and let us keep our views to ourself)

Reviews.title: Great app but alot has changed..
Reviews.text: I LOVE TikTok! It made me have better relationships with my friends and it genuinely helped me become a more confident person. But over the past few months things have started to change, and not in a good way. TikTok has stopped put Lgbtq+ and comedy videos on the FYP. (People call this “shadow banning”) Instead of funny videos and videos that make me smile, I find myself feeling trapped on TikTok. I use TikTok to express myself and have a laugh once in a while, but now all I see is politics and inappropriate dancing. There are only a few good videos and everyone hates on them. I miss old TikTok, where if I was sad I could feel happy. If I was insecure, I would learn that I wasn't alone. And I know its great to spread awareness and share the news, but I’m always getting in arguments over who’s political views are correct. This app is mean’t for children and teens. It’s supposed teach you how to spread positivity. Most if the time I learn about dangers in the world faster than my parents. Most if the people on this app are too young to be into politics, including me. (I am 13) And yes, we should know whats going in the world, but not nearly half of the things shown on the FYP (For you page). I loved this app, but I’m starting to drift away because of its new content.
